item.description:
Join others from Boston Small Business Success Network at the Harvard Extension Business Conference 2013.

Space is limited. Advance registration is required. An RSVP on Meetup will not hold a space for you. See below for registration details. This event is promoted elsewhere, so don't delay.

About This Event

The Harvard Extension Business Conference 2013 is a premiere networking and educational event for entrepreneurs, business leaders, investors, and students as well as professional community members who are interested in starting a company or growing their business.

The theme for this year is “The New Waves of Entrepreneurship”, a high-profile platform for intellectual exchange in current trends across the following areas:

  • Big Data
  • Fund Me
  • Power of Women
  • Innovation in Healthcare
  • Social Entrepreneurship
  • Lean start-up


The 2013 Business Conference will feature:

  • Keynote and Panel sessions, led by academic experts, industry specialists, venture capitalists and entrepreneurs.
  • Our famous Business Pitch Competition, connecting cutting-edge technologies and revolutionary business models with industry veterans who offer expert advice as well as resources.
  • Networking opportunities to continue to foster an active community of entrepreneurs and investors in the innovation sphere.

At the end of the day you will walk away with a road map of how to grow your business to the next level. The conference will also provide opportunity to compete and present your business idea in the HEBS Business Pitch Competition.

Cost and How to Register

Members of this Meetup qualify for a 20% discount. Use promo code 20hebs

Cost varies according to what you sign up for..

Full details are on the event website at www.HarvardEConference.com

Register here or click the yellow Register Now button to reserve your spot.

Make sure to mark your calendar now so you don't forget.

Got Questions?

You can post your questions below.
item.name: Harvard Extension Business Conference
